ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Region routines for ChIPS (CIAO contributed package)

DESC.PARA: The chips_contrib.regions module provides extra routines for using regions in ChIPS, and is provided as part of the CIAO contributed scripts package.
The module can be loaded into ChIPS, Sherpa or Python scripts by saying one of the following:
DESC.VERBATIM: from chips_contrib.regions import * from chips_contrib.all import *
DESC.PARA: where the second line will load in all the ChIPS contributed routines, not just the regions module.
The regions module currenly provides one routine:

ROW.DATA: Display a Chandra FOV (field-of-view) file as a region; see "ahelp add_fov_region" for more information.
